motos.name: BMW R-Series
motos.description: 1978 R100/7. Not restored but runs and looks good. 34,309 miles. Includes: Luftmeister period appropriate fairing (will not be mounted on bike bike but shown in some pics) Corbin seat Super Trapp exhaust Hepco & Becker hard saddle bags Progressive front fork springs Progressive rear shocks Electronic ignition Much (not all) of the hardware has been replaced with stainless hardware Body parts and fairing professionally repainted +-10 years ago (still looks good)  Bike is very sound mechanically and looks good cosmetically.  Will need new tires at some point in near future (could be ridden on but have some small cracking).  I have had this bike for many years and love it but my wife bought me an R100RS and I am not riding both.  Want it to go to a good home where it will be used.    Buyer responsible for pick up and/or shipping costs and arrangements but I will assist with shipping (flexibility for pickup etc).

motos.name: Harley-Davidson Softail
motos.description: Here's a very sharp all original paint 2010 Heritage Softail, always babied and fully serviced, very recent new rubber front and rear, 15,000 miles. Custom Borrani exhaust with a tuner, tach-speedo and Led headlight and driving lights installed, quick release windshield, soft leather bags and stiffeners, original very comfy leather seat, spill bars, lotsa little stuff also. Never down, no scratches anywhere. Nice bike!
